<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/payments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Creates a new direct payment that is immediately sent to the specified receiver. Direct payments bypass the traditional disbursement workflow and are processed instantly.

There is multiple options how to reference objects.
- Assets can be referenced either their ID or through code and issuer. 
- Receivers can either be referenced by ID, by Email, by Phone Number or Wallet Address
- Wallet can be referenced by ID or Name.
